text:
New York, NY.

Full Time.

http://www.thehackerati.com

Software developers at all experience levels, for front end, back end, and big data. We don't care what languages you know, as long as you're highly skilled in at least one. We do contract software development for mostly mid-size and large companies, using agile and the same kinds of technologies that you'd see in your typical YC startup.

Email me if interested:

alex.krupp@thehackerati.com

If you are applying for an entry-level position then please also fill out this form, as we're about to get a new hiring manager for those roles:

http://thehackerati.simplicant.com/job/detail/14999-journeym...
